title: FS: T210 Series 6 - two cards - price drop

posts.post_title: FS: T210 Series 6 - two cards - price drop
posts.post_content:
Hello,

For sale, I have two T210 Old Mill Series 6 cards. The players are Barnett and Van Landingham).

The cards are in rough and fragile shape with deep creases. The cards are complete.

Asking $35 each or both for $65 postpaid.

Please message me on Net54 with questions or offers.

Thanks!
Peter Baldes
Bump for price drop on these T210s
